Name: PlanetSprite
About the game: PlanetSprite is an online MMO where you create your own character, customize, interact, trade and play with other fellow players! Please NOTE that the game is not fully released and there are so many content that are being released part by part. In the world of PlanetSprite here are some of the features that are already available in early access: -Player customization with your own inventory and equipment! -Player owned house -Chat and interact with players, objects, and non-player characters -Minigames And many more features to come!!
